title: How did i get Scarlet poppy?
body: Title, I opened premium hextech. I own two champions . Jhin And Kayn (owns soulhunter kayn) Can i please get my jhin skin? i don't find this fair

replies.body: You get random skins and shards based on everything you don't own. It's fair.
I don't think thats how it works. I'm pretty sure it gives you a skin if you own a champion, thats 975 or under and not random when i own a champion.

Yeeeaaaa so you've already figured out that you couldn't get either of Jhin's skins due to both of them being priced at 1350.

That chest *is* meant to give you a skin for someone you own that's 975 or lower, but it looks like there may not be any skins that qualify which is why you got this one.

P.S. Sorry for the late reply, as you can tell it's been a busy few days 'round these boards xD. Wanted to make sure you still got all the info you needed!
Yeaa rip. xD I wish i knew that cause i would've bought nasus and got a free skin any day RIP
I don't think thats how it works..

I just looked into premium hextech, as I thought you were just referring to the regular chest at first (never saw a premium box myself). This box rewards skins that cost 975 or lower, and for those 2 champs listed, all their skins are above 975. When every champ you own doesn't have any 975 or lower skin available to them, it's random.
i thought jhins high noon was 975 lmao

> [{quoted}](name=IBigDaddyKaynI,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0HBqRf6K,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-08-13T08:33:45.167+0000)
>
> i thought jhins high noon was 975 lmao

When I looked at a site, it showed it being 1350. If it comes up 975 in the store in the client (I can't see, as I already own it), you may be able to argue the case and ask for them to change it.
nah you answered my question i don't need to cry about it more i made a mix-up so its fine lol
